 [Auction] Kedama's Auction #145

Level 500 (Godslayer)
+K
(IMG:[reasoningtheory.net] https://reasoningtheory.net/countdown.png?title=Kedama's%20Auction&year=2019&month=8&day=10&hour=15&minute=0)
[reasoningtheory.net] https://reasoningtheory.net/countdown.png?t...3&minute=00

Ban list: Piyin

Rules（must read)

The rules may have some changes due to the new machanism of moogle mail or other reasons.The changed one are marked in red, bigger size and bold font.It will recover to the regular colour, font and size if it doesn't meet any changes for three weeks. Please check the rules every time.

*Item auction will be extended if any bid is made in the last 15mins.it works like below:
the auction end in 23:00（15:00 UTC），
if you make a valid bid at 22:46~22:59, then this item'll be extended to 23:15 and marked with E1;
if you make a valid bid at 23:00~23:15, then it's extended to 23:25 and marked with E2;
if you make a valid bid after 23:15, then it extend another 10min(for example if the last bid is in 23:16,the deadline extend to 23:26, 23:18 extend to 23:28).
Item which has a bid after 22:30 will be marked in bold font(The whole line, not just the item name).
e.g:[code]item name (seller)
If you bid on an item which not in bold font after 22:46, the minimum bid increments is doubled(If the bid is valid, this item will be marked in bold font and the bid after this still follow the rules above. So the double increment penalty for one item effect at most once).
In brief, it is strongly recommended to bid before 22:45.

*End time is subject to the time displayed in your reply(eg. if 23:00 is the deadline, your post at 23:00 is valid，but 23:01pm is invalid.).
*Items will be send to winners with cod after auction end asap.
*All bids are in credits and must be post here.The bid should follow a form like this ''item code+your price''.
If current bid>=500k，+xx% is ok.(Do me and your competitors a favor, avoid using too much +10% in one streak. Especially in the last few minutes.)
*Any wrong code or wrong bid is invalid and will be ignored.
*Your bid must be multiple of 1k,bid like 566.6k,1.2345m is invalid and I will round up.
*I'll not update regularly so check the latest post before your bid.
*Do not edit your post,correction should be in a new post. I'll ignore any edited post.
Also ,if you want to cancel a bid, post '[code] cancel' to cancel it.

*You can cancel your bid freely until one hour left(before 22:00(14:00 UTC)).
After 22:00(14:00 UTC) however, you can only cancel the bid which you post it within 5 minutes.

*When you cancel the bid, it means both your current and former bids on this item are cancelled. The current highest bid will return to the minimum winning bid (must be valid) from the second highest bidder.
e.g:
bidder A: 100k,200k,700k,1m,3m
bidder B: 150k,300k,800k,2m,5m
bidder C: 50k,500k
If B cancel his bid, the minimum winning bid should be 700k from A.

You are free to give a new bid after you cancel it.
*there are too many bids in the last 30min and the price of the 1st page can't be updated immediately.
i suggest you pay attention to the bids made by others on what you want.
*Start bid: 50k except defined ones.
minimum Bid increments (normal):
For equipment:50k if current bid <500k.
10% if current bid >=500k.
For materials:50k if current bid <1m.
5% if current bid >=1m.

minimum Bid increments (for the item which not in bold font between 22:46~23:00, for more details check the timetable above):
For equipment:100k if current bid <500k.
20% if current bid >=500k.
For materials:100k if current bid <1m.
10% if current bid >=1m.

The rules above might be tricky and a lot of bidders still confused about them. So I made a graph to make it more intuitive.
(IMG:[i.imgur.com] https://i.imgur.com/rB17oEh.jpg)
[i.imgur.com] https://i.imgur.com/rB17oEh.jpg

Please contact me if someone give an invalid bid but I still update it.
*The winner must clear CoD within 72 hours(if you need more time please contact me before bidding).
Proxy Auction Rules:

*I'd take 10% of the final payment as a charge (free charge if your income <=500k).Free.
*The auction normally start on Wednesday and end on Saturday every week.
*MM me your equipments/items with "Subject name:auction",please name the equip link and it will make my work much easier.
*The auction start price is 50k so if I see your item not worth at least 50k I'll return it.
*You could mention me a higher start price in MM if your item is expensive.
*You are NOT allowed to change the start bid after the auction start.
*If you change your mind and want to cancel your item, please contact me by pm/mm. This should be done in 24 hours after the auction start.
*You are not allowed to cancel your item after 24 hours.
*Recall your item is forbidden after the auction start. If it was done by mistake, please send it again immediately. If you recall your item without a proper explanation, I will not accept your item anymore.

Due to the rate of unsold equip is very high recently. So I decide to filter out things stricter. I check the recent auctions for the things that almost impossible to sell and get the new filter rules.
I won't accept magnificent above level 300 anymore(except radiant,charged phase and power slaughter)
None slaughter melee weapon (except wakizashi):adb must ≥70%(unless the level is under 350)
Wakizashi:adb must ≥70%(unless the level is under 350)
Staff:Useless suffix staff will not be accepted(unless peerless).
Shield：blk must ≥50%(unless the level is under 350)
None charged,radiant phase: edb must ≥50%(unless the level is under 350).
None charged(Elementalist,Heaven-sent,Demon-fiend) cotton: prof must ≥50%
None Elementalist,Heaven-sent,Demon-fiend suffix cotton:Only accept peerless.
Shade armor(Fleet,Negation,Arcanist):adb must ≥70%(unless the level is under 350)
Leather:Only accept peerless.
Power armor(Protection,Warding,balance):adb must ≥50%(unless the level is under 350)
Plate:Only accept level under 350 or shielding prefix or peerless.
If you are not sure about your equip,please feel free to send me and I will judge it myself.

规则说明（出价必读）:

*单件物品拍卖最后15分钟的有效出价会进入加时：
以23:00(15:00 UTC)拍卖结束为例，
22:46~22:59间的有效出价将统一延时至23:15结束，标记为E1；
23:00~23:15间的有效出价将统一延时至23:25结束，标记为E2；
23:15之后的加时为顺延10分钟(23:16顺延至23:26,23:20顺延至23:30）。
所有22:30分之后有出价的物品将会以加粗的字体展示。(一整行都会加粗，不仅仅是装备名)。
例:[序号]物品名 (卖家)
如果你在22:46分后为一个未加粗字体的物品出价，该物品的加价下限加倍（如果此出价生效，此物品将以加粗字体
展示，接下来的其他出价也将按照上面的规则。所以一个物品的加倍加价惩罚最多生效一次）。
总而言之，强烈建议在22:45分前出价。

*出价时间以系统显示为准(如23:00结束，则23:00出价为有效，23:01出价为无效)。
*拍卖结束后如无特殊情况我会第一时间发cod。
*出价必须在本帖回复包含“物品代码”及价格。
*标价大于50万后可以用百分比表示加价。(请避免使用连续的百分比形式的加价。)
*出价代码错误或价格错误无效。
*出价必需为1k的整数倍，如有低于1k的小数则取整至1k。
*本层价格可能不能经常更新，出价前请留意最新出价贴。
*编辑帖子出价无效，有任何改动请在此贴内发新回复。
另外，如果你需要撤销出价，请发新回复“[序号] cancel”来取消这个物品的出价。

*拍卖结束前一小时22:00(14:00 UTC)之前的出价可以随意撤销。
22:00(14:00 UTC)之后只能撤销五分钟之内的出价。
如果你撤销了出价，你对此物品的当前和以前的所有出价都将取消。此物品的最高出价恢复成第二最高出
价者的最低成交价(该出价必须是有效的)。
举例：
买家A： 100k,200k,700k,1m,3m
买家B: 150k,300k,800k,2m,5m
买家C: 50k,500k
如果B取消出价，则此物品的最低成交价为A的700k。

在取消出价后，你可以继续对此物品重新出价。
最后半小时由于出价密集,届时首页标价来不及即时更新。请自行在回复中关注你中意物品的当前出价。
*起拍价5万，物主可自定起拍价。
加价下限说明：
加价下限（正常）：
装备：若目前出价低于50万，则每次加价至少5万。
若目前出价≥50万，则每次加价至少10%。
材料：若目前出价低于100万，则每次加价至少5万。
若目前出价≥100万，则每次加价至少5%。

加价下限（在22:46~23:00间没有加粗字体展示的物品，详细信息见上方时间表）：
装备：若目前出价低于50万，则每次加价至少10万。
若目前出价≥50万，则每次加价至少20%。
材料：若目前出价低于100万，则每次加价至少10万。
若目前出价≥100万，则每次加价至少10%。

*货款必需于cod发出后72小时内付清，如果希望延期付款请于出价前联系我。

拍品接收规则:

*代拍费用为你本期最终收入的10%（如小于等于500k将不收取）。免费。
*拍卖一般在每周三开始，每周六结束。
*请将装备/材料直接mm给我，Subject一栏填“auction”，请附上正确装备链接。
*起拍价格为50k，如果装备很难起拍会被退信。
*你可以设定更高起拍价格，请于信中附上起拍价格。
*拍卖开始后不可以更改起拍价格。
*如果你想撤销你的拍品，请在拍卖开始后24小时内pm/mm我。
*拍卖开始24小时后不允许再取消拍品。
*拍卖开始后禁止收回拍品。如果这是误操作，请立即重新寄给我。
如果你收回了拍品并且没有正当的理由，我将不再接收你的拍品
由于近期拍品流拍量较高。因此准备对拍品进行更严格的筛选。翻了一下近期的拍卖，统计了几乎无法卖出的东西
后制定了一下新的筛选规则。
不再接受大于300级的magnificent装备（魔光，加速，杀戮动力甲除外）
除胁差以外非杀戮后缀装备：adb必须≥70%(350级以下除外)
胁差:adb必须≥70%(350级以下除外)
杖:不再接收无用后缀(无双品质除外)
盾：blk必须≥50%(350级以下除外)
非加速，魔光相位: edb 必须≥50%(350级以下除外)
非加速(元素，圣，暗熟练后缀) 棉布: prof 必须≥50%
非元素，圣，暗熟练后缀 棉布:只接受无双品质
影甲(闪避，否定，奥术):adb 必须≥70%(350级以下除外)
皮甲:只接受无双品质
动力甲(保护，魔防，平衡):adb 必须≥50%(350级以下除外)
板甲:只接受350级以下，或者格挡前缀，或者无双品质
如果你不确定你的装备是否达标，请直接寄给我，我会自己判断。
